entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a DiagnosticSuppressor for diagnostics that guide users to not follow the Custom Marshaller shapes #71793
  • System.Numerics.BigRational and System.Numerics.MathR #71791
  • Fix per object heap commit tracking for regions #71790
    7.0.0
  • Linux perf support regressed on W^X enabled runs #71786
    7.0.0
  • Duplicate object keys shouldn't result in an ArgumentException #71784
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests failure in checked coreclr Linux x64 Release #71776
  • [API Proposal]: Rename RateLimiter.WaitAsync #71775
    7.0.0
  • Passing a path to a key that doesn't exist to OpenSubKey() causes a SafeRegistryHandle to be finalized #71773
  • Cross-platform distributed transactions #71769
    Future
  • GetFromJsonAsync does not respect MaxResponseContentBufferSize property of HttpClient #71763
  • Failing to create a thread shouldn't assume that this an out of memory issue #71761
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_42732/test42732/test42732.sh #71755
    7.0.0
  • Use of PreallocationSize in runtime repo on Linux #71753
  • [API Proposal]: `CancellationTokenRegistration.IsRegistered` #71751
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1-M12-Beta2\\b79250\\b79250\\b79250.cmd #71748
    7.0.0

Closed

  • GC.GetTotalMemory can crash in rare cases when it races with background GC #41413
    7.0.0
  • should report accumulated GC pause time #55532
    7.0.0
  • Access to System.GC.RetainVM when deploying a Single File Application #42720
    7.0.0
  • Testing GC Heap Counts with Containers #71413
  • Error generating win-x86 SuperPMI asm diffs for libraries.crossgen2 collection #61482
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json GetConverterFromAttribute need to be annotated for native aot #68878
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializerOptions copy constructor should include the metadata resolver #71716
    7.0.0
  • Remove implicit fallback to reflection-based serialization in System.Text.Json sourcegen #71714
    7.0.0
  • No access to public Azure feeds? #65430
  • Wasm-tools installation fails for preview 5 complaining about unsigned Emscripten package #71391
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete crypto factory methods accepting a string #70436
    7.0.0
  • Does IBCMerge make sense for crossgen? #34422
    7.0.0
  • Deadlock in EventListener static constructor #70870
    7.0.0
  • Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom not Returning SocketFlags in NET6 #70353
    7.0.0
  • ICorProfilerInfo6::EnumNgenModuleMethodsInliningThisMethod returns no inlined methods for System.Private.CoreLib #71774
    7.0.0
  • Optimize System.Text.ASCIIUtility for arm64 using cross-platform intrinsics #41292
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #70766
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add APIs for COSE signing #69896
    7.0.0
  • Logic fault in supported COSE signature algorithm vlaidaiton #70189
    7.0.0
  • COSE_Sign messages (multiple signers) can be read, validated, and created #62599
    7.0.0
  • There may be unexpectedly high delays in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` operations #69206
    7.0.0
  • PgoManager::ReadPgoData doesn't close file on error? #47485
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #70133
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose additional flags and validation in `NegotiateAuthentication` #70982
  • Assertion at..., condition '<disabled>' Blazor Web assembly (.NET 6.0) #67911
    7.0.0
  • [Android] System.Tests.StringTests failures for hu-HU and tr-TR cultures #60568
    7.0.0
  • An extra prompt dialog display during testing ASP.Net symbols on VS 17.4 preview 1 #71704
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.SslClientAuthenticationOptionsExtensions #71697
  • "No output has been received" when debugging Blazor Wasm in the browser - can't debug #70841
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[regArgNum + i].slot == 0' #57606
    7.0.0
  • wrong exception line number in stack trace in the publish package #71680
  • System.Private.Uri.Functional.Tests crash in CI #63959
  • runtime-community leg failing for ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest #71173
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/TieredVtableMethodTests/TieredVtableMethodTests.sh #68197
  • [API Proposal]: ImmutableDictionary.SetItems(params ValueTuple<TKey, TValue>[] Values) #71092
    Future
  • Publish .netstandard2.0 dlls as Unity packages to NPM feed #71758
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #71645
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws random errors running in parallel on 64-bit .NET Core 3.1 or .NET 6 runtime on Windows 7 #66272
    8.0.0
  • [Libraries][Android] Turkish Culture edge case System.Collections.NonGeneric.Tests fail on Android #37069
    7.0.0
  • Examine JsonSerializer behavior for ref structs & pointers #34779
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_SyncStream.MultipleThreadsLooping #69772
    7.0.0
  • Use readonly/scoped with existing ref structs that accept spans #71497
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: {ReadOnly}Span(ref T) constructor #67445
    7.0.0
  • Application crashes with "Parent class failed to load, due to: Invalid generic instantiation assembly" #71424
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Describe the validity of null managed pointers #71794
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make sure the struct field offset matches with that of parent during morphing #71792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitDoSsa=0 #71789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support stateful linear collection marshalling #71788
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Update MonoAOTCompiler to provide reference assemblies location #71787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection #71783
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enable direct decomposition of promoted args on ARM #71780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix more warnings from updated IDE rules #71779
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Propagate typeof() during inlining #71778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NegotiateAuthentication: Implement additional API surface #71777
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable Rfc2898DeriveBytes on Browser WASM #71768
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • JIT: Remove some fgWalkTree uses #71767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use file-scoped types in RegexGenerator output #71765
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Avoid calling mono_metadata_type_hash () on the container clas… #71764
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Tar: for directories, use a default mask that has the 'x' bit. #71760
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle GTF_REVERSE_OPS in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv #71759
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide upgrade response details #71757
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable test now that the msbuild fix has propagated #71745
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • [PERF][MAUI] Changed the number of Maui iOS Blazor startups from 7 to 5. #71781
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Silence SPMI replay REL32 reloc warning on 32-bit #71750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update all internal marshallers to the new model #71470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove implicit fallback to reflection-based serialization #71746
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add an ETW event for reporting richer debug information back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete Create(string) cryptographic factory methods #71230
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix Avx2.cs comments #71448
    community-contribution
  • Fix EventSource deadlock #71574
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Return receive flags from ReceiveMessageFromAsync on Windows #71462
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix some null reference exceptions and improve nullable annotations #71548
    area-System.Security
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LoggingGenerator). #71651
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix reordering arguments when normalizing in impPopCallArgs #70992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiChar intrinsic on AArch64 #71637
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Ensure that CreateChecked, CreateSaturating, and CreateTruncating are publicly exposed #71493
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add IsSet check before calling ConfigNoCache::AsString in ds_rt_server_log_pause_message #71756
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle some rare scenarios in local morph #71536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Preparatory changes for enabling direct decomposition of promoted locals into `FIELD_LIST`s on ARM #71726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating a few BitConverter APIs to be intrinsic #71567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add new MultiSign APIs and address API review feedback on existing ones #71390
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Bump Intellisense package version to Preview5 #71772
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Bump PreReleaseVersion to Preview7 #71770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Better error handling in SubtleCrypto workers #71693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add note about Array.Initialize to ECMA-335 augments #71766
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Close PGO data file when done with it reliably #71744
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove GeneratePackageOnBuild missed on branding PR #71743
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] JSImport, JSExport and related API types for JavaScript interop #71500
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add markdown readme for System.Collections.Immutable #71247
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix incoming arg struct splitting #71701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ICustomTypeMarshallingStrategy implementations into separate files #71747
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • #37093 disable Reciprocal test only for Android x86 #71541
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono] Avoid calling mono_metadata_type_hash () on the container clas… #71734
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #71546
    area-Meta
  • Use scoped more in dotnet/runtime #71589
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Reduce allocation overhead of Enumerable.Order{Descending} #71564
    area-System.Linq
  • Make things work for arrays of function pointers #71749
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update ILToNativeMap event to include IL version #71479
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve objcopy detection #71742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing public field order for System.Numerics types #71728
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle stateless collection marshalling with non-blittable elements #71724
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Vectorize Convert.ToBase64String #71795
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #71319 #71461
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP]Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Bring over distributed transactions support for Windows #71433
    area-System.Transactions
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist #71573
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Improve Generics support in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #71619
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    area-System.Configuration
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] JSImport and JSExport code gen #71551
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fixed issue #71641 #71671
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Tar, Zip: respect umask when creating files. #71647
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for EventSourceGeneration). #71662
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Try fewer call spills #70932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor segment size computation #71178
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM #71598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix `ldelem[a]/stelem/cpobj/ldobj/stobj <pointer type>` import #71679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid OOMing in very large functions when checking LIR #71066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode an intrinsic #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always expand "obj is ExactClass" even in cold blocks #71739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Mix newer kernel versions into library test matrix #71740
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix debugging on Mac and iOS #71731
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Less aggressive `stfld` spilling #71663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Log as error in interop generator when method signature is not supported #71477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid transformation from multiplication to left shift in case of 64 bit value #71189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add an Azure NPM registry #71393
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Throw explanatory error when .NET CLI is used to try to build a .NET Framework project #26473
  • With .NET 7 preview7 installed, Failed to run winforms/WPF #26467

Closed

  • Testhost.exe does not find '7.0.0-preview.6.22324.4' runtime when running tests #26462

PullRequests

Updated

  • Change linker to trim everything by default in 7.0 #26246
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • Add --info Option to Workload Base Command For Future Triage #26458
    Area-Workloads
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • File-local types #6011
  • readonly members on interfaces #3055
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in LDM-2021-06-07.md #6260

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding ManagedModuleUpdateStatus.TemporarilyBlocked #62491
  • Inconsistent / missing errors for scoped keyword usages #62490
  • Test plan for "Default Lambda Parameters" #62485
  • AnalyzerConfigDocumentOpenedClosedEvents is flaky #62479
  • EnC crash #62478
    17.3
  • Incremental tracking steps can produce no data at all if a substep filters down to no-items. #62468
  • Public API to compare symbols across different compilations #62465
    C# 12.0
  • Add assertions in compiler for ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic #62456
    C# 12.0

Closed

  • Specify interface when using "Extract interface" refactoring #59246
    Backlog
  • search handler assertion failure #62365
  • Ensure `ScanType()` and `ParseType()` recognize `delegate*<...>?` #53973
    Compiler.Next
  • IDE0074 is offered for pointers #62473
  • Refactoring from implicit to explicit type doesn't seem to work properly with nullabilty #62474
  • Binlogs / cmdline should include generator timing info #60347
    17.3
  • Update ModuleMetadata to hold onto an object it can keep-alive. #61778
    17.4
  • Revise SyntaxGenerator for file types #62274
  • Remove LangVer check for `nameof(parameter)` feature before shipping #60640
    17.4
  • Improve error recovery for `partial file class` #62434
  • '??=' Syntax Bug to show 'IDE0060' message #53660
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 17.3 doesn't include CS9026 in error list or IDE highlight #61484
    17.3
  • C# 7.1 Build failing on Build Server. #24982
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add tests showing the limitations of file-local type shadowing #62489
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Features/editorconfig lsp #62484
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Immediately filter syntax trees down to those that either have attributes or global-using-aliases. #62483
    Area-Compilers
  • Diagnostic reported for scoped modifier on non-ref struct type should be a warning only #62475
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Resolve overflow with deeply nested UTF-8 concatenation #62469
    Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • EnC: Handle partially loaded projects #62454
    Area-Interactive
  • Enable nullable for classes under Rename folder #62453
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main into features/editorconfig_lsp #62487
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62480
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62482
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62481
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add default lambda parameter status #62486
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Prevent assert from being hit #62366
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer '??=' for pointer types #62476
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to a callback for cleaning up resources instead of passing in an explicit IDisposable. #62373
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Filter trees to only those containing global-usings or attributes prior to analyzing them. #62444
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #62477
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62470
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62472
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62471
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bump the integration test timeouts a bit #62446
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Complete 'file' support for `SyntaxGenerator` #62413
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer #62337
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fixed shared project file error #62466
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Exclude BCL libraries from Roslyn vsix #62119
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to ensure error list de-duping f… #62237
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62460
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62462
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62459
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62457
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62455
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62450
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62451
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebASM-Blazor slices #42622
  • [Blazor] Support state within NavigationManager #42617
  • Throw `Exception` if JSInterop calls are made without Blazor Synchronization Context #42616
  • Blazor Server `FetchData` Page Missing `Authorize` Attribute #42615
  • Print the output from the devserver process #42614
  • Model Binding in Razor Page #42610
  • repeat audience property will be generate during using JwtSecurityToken class #42609
  • Intermittent ObjectDisposedException in SPA Hosting #42608
  • Use of [AsParameters] attribute #42605

Closed

  • JsonSerializerOptions constructor is not copying the context #38720
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpSys Not Support IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses #42549
    Discussions
  • SignalR Core Nuget Package is deprecated? #42601
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41281
    7.0-preview7
  • Authentication/Authorization API changes for preview.7 #42481
    7.0-preview7
  • Cookie authentication handler calls `SessionStore.RenewAsync()` on sign in with expired session. #41516
    7.0-preview7
  • Add some tests for ITicketStore for CookieAuth #23020
    7.0-preview7
  • Introduce interfaces to describe IResult types #42187
    7.0-preview7
  • Remove `Authentication` property from `WebApplicationBuilder` #42577
    7.0-preview7
  • Signlar 1006 error on win 2016 server when message size incresed #41675
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] Unhandled exception rendering component: The given key was not present in the dictionary. #42598
  • Blazor Catch-All Route ignores razor page routes #42584
  • ProtectedLocalStorage cannot be mocked for unit tests #42594
  • How to intercept oninitialized and onafterrender in each blazor component ? #42581
  • Support disabling auto-registering auth middlewares in WAB #42596
    7.0-preview7
  • signalr data deposition #42402
  • CORS setting in asp.net core 6.0 is not restricting the origins #42463

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS from 2.2.0 to 2.2.6 in /src/Servers/IIS/IIS/test/testassets/InProcessNewShimWebSite #42624
    area-runtime, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    7.0-preview7
  • Update custom marshallers for source-generated interop to the V2 shapes. #42619
    area-runtime
  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix Typos #42612
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1866136 #42551
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview7
  • Dispose httpclient in IIS tests #41283
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [Infrastructure] Update SDK version #42571
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • AuthN: Use single scheme as DefaultScheme #42497
    breaking-change, area-security, 7.0-preview7
  • Cookie Auth: Fix bug with ticket store #42606
    area-security, 7.0-preview7
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview7
  • Remove Authentication property from WebApplicationBuilder and fix up middleware auto-registration #42585
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication, 7.0-preview7
  • Make ResultsOfTGenerator non-packable #42604
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Trim Microsoft.AspNetCore #42555
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Retry flaky `AttributeRouting_RouteNameTokenReplace_Reachable` #42602
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Add gRPC trimming end-to-end test #42572
    area-grpc
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Remove Pseudo-Headers From Public API #42496
    area-runtime
  • Fix up signing key handling in user-jwts and runtime #42603
    area-commandlinetools
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Support state in NavigationManager #42534
    area-blazor
  • Add utf8 text overloads for creating results #42595
    area-runtime
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flyout menus don't work; CollectionView lists don't work; ListView lists don't work; Frames don't work... I am super frustrated... #8602
  • Investigate quicker lookup of nested horizontal ScrollView on Android #8601
  • [Windows 10] Feature for allowing to expand Shell.TitleView without clicking See more button #8597
  • CheckBox's VisualState is not work #8596
  • Font loading impacts Windows desktop startup #8594
  • Improve linking of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.* assemblies #8593
    6.0-servicing
  • Suggestion: Add Dictate (voice to text input) context menu option in any editable text field #8589
  • Label Height doesn't get updated with text #8588
  • Reconsider the base page type of any page to be type of TemplatedPage #8587
  • Properties Height and Width have values equal -1 after Initialization of page components #8586
  • BlazorWebView NavigationManager in WPF #8583
  • Shell menu is responding to system theme changes when an explicit theme is used #8582
  • ListView Select Behaver is different between Windows and MacOS #8581
    6.0-servicing
  • ListView has a default Corner Radius on Windows #8580
  • TabbedPage title displays incorrectly. It displays current selected child page title #8577
  • Windows Desktop MenuBarItems displayed inside a tabbed page needs to display inside main toolbar #8576
  • [Android] If to set SystemUiVisibility = SystemUiFlags.HideNavigation on Android, then Flyout Items are not displayed. #8575
  • On Android only, buttons inside grid stays invisible after grid visibility changes to true #8574
  • Windows and iOS: CollectionView selection does not display selection when page appearing #8573
  • CollectionView and ListView are setting SelectedItem to null on control load. #8572

Closed

  • .net blazor maui Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException "Byte array index ... does not exist" using DotNetStreamReference #7865
    .NET 7
  • Android Switch Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update) #8312
    6.0-sr3
  • Debugging and error logging on VS Mac and Blazor MAUI #8551
  • Entry changes font family when IsPassword is true #7966
  • Entry (IsPassword="True") Placeholder does not take a FontFamily #7624
    6.0-sr3
  • [Proposal] Show progress of issue on GitHub #8566
  • CustomView causes a memory leak #8557
  • Cannot build with App.xaml.cs moved to MAUI class library #8585
  • TranslationY is ignored #6562
    6.0-servicing
  • EmbeddedResource is not working with SVG image #7288
  • Exception being thrown on android physical device with latest version of .NET MAUI #7002
    6.0-servicing
  • Shell on Windows: No Text #7082
  • Tab appearance properties no effect on MenuBarItems. #7083
  • Collection View in MAUI iOS, Android scrolling erratically. #8170
  • <Label Text={Binding .} /> works in Debug but not Release #8182
  • [Android] Label HorizontalTextAlignment not correctly set #8339
  • VS 2022: Unable to debug Maui Windows applications: "Access is denied" #8353
  • MAUI on VS2022 (community preview) 17.3.0 preview 2.0 Content Page Title #8356

PullRequests

Created

  • Add updated Tools paths #8600
  • [xamlc] add compiled PointTypeConverter #8599
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #8584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/ListView, 6.0-servicing

Merged

  • Call UpdateEmptyView when switching adapters #8522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Set the correct font using IsPassword property on Entry #8015
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [ios] Set block to null when cancelled #8591
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/dispatching, 6.0-sr3
  • Update previous MAUI version to the new version #8590
  • Fix some ScrollView rotation issues on iOS #8570
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr3
  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7

Updated

  • Implement menu separators #8565
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, .NET 7
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • Just call Arrange to set the Frame #8569
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
  • Update SGen to add "NET6_0_OR_GREATER" instead of NET5 #8548
    area/architecture, .NET 7
  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support C# 11 Required #28391

  • Block use of SpatiaLite 5 #28386
    7.0.0

Closed

  • TPC migration attempts to drop nonexistent table for base type #28298
    7.0.0
  • DbSet names are not used for table names in TPT and TPC mappings #28193
    7.0.0
  • FindAsync rough edges when passing CancellationToken #22667
    7.0.0-preview7
  • Microbenchmark perf regression in update benchmarks #27681
    7.0.0-preview7
  • Concurrency token not working when Tracking is activated #28379
  • Tracking Down SQL Cache Plan Issue #28387
  • When I run dotnet ef update database I get this error: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the login process. #28388
  • Add support StandardDeviation query #28385

PullRequests

Merged

  • Store null table name and TPH mapping strategy in the snapshot #28359
  • Allow cancellation token to be passed as part of params array in FindAsync #28389
  • Bump NetTopologySuite from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 #28326

Updated

  • Scaffolding: Refactor some code #28358
  • Fix scaffolding of reference navigations with NRT (#27616) #28382

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
